job.title: Front End Software Engineer
job.description: ltpgtFounded in 2016 by childhood friends and business partners Ryan Hogan and Derrick Smith Hunt A Killer is a fastgrowing entertainment company disrupting conventional storytelling by delivering immersive interactive entertainment experiences to over 100000 subscribers worldwideampnbspltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtHunt A Killer started as a single event that blended the concepts of escape rooms interactive theater and live entertainment by engaging participants in a 200acre living crime scene From that first foray into entertainment we learned invaluable lessons including how to truly immerse our audience in our experiences and the importance of learning from our audience In October 2016 Hunt A Killer launched our flagship monthly subscription box to 56 subscribers Hunt A Killer has continued to learn and grow evolving its products and distribution model to double our business yearoveryear Today we ship 150000 episodic and complete mystery game boxes direct to consumers each month and sell purposebuilt games through retail channels In 2019 Hunt A Killer was named one of Fast Companys Worlds Most Innovative Companies and in 2020 we placed 6th in the INC 5000 FastestGrowing CompaniesltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtHunt A Killer is now working on additional ways to distribute our revolutionary content including licensing and digital channels to immerse more people in our stories With this in mind and a course set for the horizon we continue building a diverse team of creative decisionmakers because together we can do anythingltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtHunt A Killer is committed to bringing together individuals from different backgrounds and perspectives We strive to create an inclusive environment where everyone can thrive feel a sense of belonging and do great work togetherampnbspOur goal is to build a great team  with a great team we can accomplish anythingltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtABOUT THE ROLEltstronggtltpgtltpgtWe are seeking a FrontEnd Engineer to join the Technology team who will have responsibilities across the full software development lifecycle You will be primarily focused on development using frameworks and tools such as ASPNET Core and ReactJS Development activities include working with business SMEs to understand requirements and working with likeminded team members to apply best practices such as SOA Agile and TDDBDD to daily development activitiesltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtLOCATIONltstronggtltpgtltpgtWe encourage candidates in near both ltstronggtBaltimore MDltstronggt and ltstronggtSeattle WAltstronggt to applyltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtYOURE THRILLED ABOUT THIS ROLE BECAUSE YOU WILLltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtLove solving problems have a love for programming and enjoy working in a small team environmentltligtltligtBe constantly thinking of ways to use to code to make products and processes betterltligtltligtBe constantly focused on finding the right solutions for some of the most challenging problemsltligtltligtRally the team around you to keep pushing when everyone throws their hands in the air in frustration  because after all it takes a team to launch things successfully And of course working at a gaming company is a big plus for youltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtWERE THRILLED TO WELCOME YOU TO THE TEAM BECAUSE YOU HAVEltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtA BS or MS degree in Computer Science Information Technology or related field from an accredited college or universityltligtltligtMinimum of 3 years of experience in manymost of the following skills C ampamp NET Framework andor NET Core ASPNET MVC 40 ampamp 50 Web API 20 HTML5 with Razor Entity Framework MSSQL Entity Framework React React Native vanilla JavaScript and PHPltligtltligtework MSSQL Entity Framework React React Native vanilla JavaScript and PHPltligtltligtSufficient experience developing and deploying applications in AzureltligtltligtRESTful web services development and integration experienceltligtltligtDemonstrated proficiency working on development platforms using multiple programming languagesltligtltligtDemonstrated proficiency working on development platforms using multiple programming languagesltligtltligtThe ability to pick up new technologies quicklyltligtltligtA high comfortable level of experience with source control solutions such as GitGitHubltligtltligtStrong analytical and problemsolving skillsltligtltligtExcellent written and oral communication skillsltligtltligtThe ability to identify and communicate potential issues while determining solutionsltligtltligtExcellent development estimation skillsltligtltligtDemonstrated understanding of development standards and expectations for deliverablesltligtltligtThe ability to adapt to and embrace new situations changing priorities and emerging technologiesltligtltligtThe ability to work on teams with diverse skills backgroundsltligtltligtMust have the ability to work under pressure but continue to think clearly and provide support or guidance to team members during challenging projects and schedulesltligtltligtDemonstrated proficiency working collaboratively with lesstechnical teams across the software development life cycleltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtYOULL LOVE HUNT A KILLER BECAUSE WEltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtAre passionate about innovations in entertainment and are obsessed with member satisfactionltligtltligtOffer competitive compensation comprehensive health dental and vision and 401k with matchingltligtltligtBelieve in time off and encourage as muchltligtltligtSolve complex problems on a daily basisltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtHunt A Killer is an EOE MFDVltpgt
